SoloGameSetup.ScriptSource:
#
# Card Id: DolGuldurOrcs
# Card Text: Sentinel
# Author: Bart Lim

class DolGuldurOrcs:
  # Default initialization for the script
  def __init__(self):
    pass

  # Triggers when a card enters play
  def whenPlayed(self, thisCard):
    thisCard.AddAttribute(StagingCardAttribute.IsSentinel)

#
# Card Id: WargRiders
# Card Text: Pursuit. All Orcs gain Pursuit.
# Author: Bart Lim

class WargRiders:
  # Default initialization for the script
  def __init__(self):
    pass

  # Triggers when a card enters play
  def whenPlayed(self, thisCard):
    thisCard.AddAttribute(StagingCardAttribute.IsPursuit)

#
# Card Id: EliteDolGuldurOrcs

class EliteDolGuldurOrcs:

  def __init__(self):

  def whenPlayed(self, thisCard):
    thisCard.AddAttribute(StagingCardAttribute.IsVigilant)
